data.name: LeftRightMarginScale
desc: specifies a left and right margin.

items.name: AutoFirstLine
lines: specifies if the automatic calculation of the first line indent occurs.

items.name: FirstLine
lines: specifies a first line indent relative to TextLeft in 1/100th mm.

items.name: Left
lines: specifies a left margin in 1/100th mm.

items.name: Right
lines: specifies a right margin in 1/100th mm.

items.name: ScaleFirstLine
lines: specifies a scale value for the first line margin in percent.

items.name: ScaleLeft
lines: specifies a scale value for the left margin in percent.

items.name: ScaleRight
lines: specifies a scale value for the right margin in percent.

items.name: TextLeft
lines: specifies a left text margin in 1/100th mm.
